snippet: Liberals are already smarting over Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s refusal to support an income tax increase on the wealthy in New York City.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is pushing rewrite on how state taxes banking industry, hoping to discourage financial services companies from migrating to other states; his plan, which includes a tax cut for all corporations, not just banks, is prompting distress among some labor leaders and liberal activists.
lead_paragraph: Liberals are already smarting over Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s refusal to support an income tax increase on the wealthy in New York City.

headline.main: Cuomo’s Tax Overhaul Plan Distresses Some Who See a Windfall for Banks
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Tax Overhaul Plan Distresses Some Who See a Windfall for Banks
